data.eml:eml: A new Globba with large white floral bracts from Peninsular Malaysia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sam, Yen Yen, Ibrahim, Halijah (2016): A new Globba with large white floral bracts from Peninsular Malaysia. PhytoKeys 73: 117-124, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.73.9737, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.73.9737
